data.title: Jim's 10th Birthday
data.body: Come to our place at 3939 Farley Rd on Saturday.

comments.comment: My kids will love to be there! See ya.
We can't come that day, sorry Rachel! But I'll do my best to stop by sometime during next week.

data.title: Oceans Quiz
data.body: How did your child find the quiz? Paulo said it was hard.

comments.comment: Jennie came home crying after this quiz...

data.title: Multiplication Test
data.body: Paulo's pretty worried about this one.

comments.comment: He should be ready, Paulo's one of the best students in Math!

data.title: Lisbon schools are No.1
data.body: The Lisbon school system was recently voted the best in Portugal. Thanks to the teachers for makeing this possible.

data.title: Tips for dealing with bullies
data.body: Bullying is a big problem that affects lots of kids. Three-quarters of all kids say they have been bullied or teased. Try asking you child if anyone at school gets called mean names.

data.title: Class pet during the holiday
data.body: Can anyone volunteer to look after Pedro, the class Guinea Pig during the November 1st holiday?

data.title: Last day of school party
data.body: I'm so excited to see you all again! It is pot luck, please bring something to eat or drink.

comments.comment: Looking forward to it! I'll bring ice cream.

data.title: Science assignment taking a long time.
data.body: This weeks Science assignment is taking a long time. Can there be an extension until after the weekend?

data.title: Sports day event at school
data.body: Do the kids need to bring gym strip?

comments.comment: Yes, please do. They will be running around on the field. Also, bring a jacket since it might rain

data.title: Ocean Life - PBS Kids
data.body: Great show! The whole family really enjoyed this.

data.title: Lisbon Natural Museum
data.body: Did you see the giant blue whale skeleton?

comments.comment: It's the biggest whale skeleton in Portugal!
